overall.description: Construct an array from a text file, using regular expression parsing.

file.description: Filename or file object to read.

regexp.description: Regular expression used to parse the file. Groups in the regular expression correspond to fields in the dtype.

encoding.description: Encoding used to decode the inputfile. Does not apply to input streams.  New in version 1.14.0.

output.description: The output array, containing the part of the content of file that was matched by regexp. output is always a structured array.
